story: Once upon a time, in The Whispering Wood there was a revolutionary whose name was Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was a Lord from the House Baratheon. It was the Middle Of the Night in The Trident when Arya Stark threatened the  happiness of Robert Baratheon . Robert Baratheon was scared of the pausing Time power of Arya Stark and refused to fight back. It was the Summer Solstice in The Whispering Wood when Robert Baratheon met Shae .  From Shae Robert Baratheon learnt the power of erasing Memory. It was the first day of Spring when Robert Baratheon finally gatherered the  courage to travel to The Ruby Ford.  Robert Baratheon met Gendry. Together they formed an alliance and fought against Eddard Stark. It resulted in an epic Loss. It was Christmas in Crossroads Inn when  Robert Baratheon faced Arya Stark. Robert Baratheon used the power of fire Resistance , but Arya Stark used mind Reading. Our hero was Safe. After a bloody fight, Robert Baratheon finally saved lifestyle. Soon after Arya Stark was hungry for revenge and chased down Robert Baratheon. It was the first day of Spring in Moat Cailin,  when our hero met Arya Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Robert Baratheon won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Winter Solstice in Riverlands when Robert Baratheon was finally safe, and celebrated with Gendry by making fireworks.
